ksp 1.5

build id = 02332

I just installed ksp 1.5 today fresh, with no other previous installations on my computer. I started a career mode save, but my funds/reputation/science bar won't come up. I've already tried redownloading and reinstalling to no avail.

https://imgur.com/6hjNX5v

Edit: I've found it is tied to the UI scale. If I set the UI scale above 160%, the resource bard disappears entirely.

Edited October 18, 2018 by doggyjoe9

Had the same issue with the Science reputation and funds bar being hidden at ui scale 170

Reducing it to 160 fixed my issue too

Thanks
